name: World War II Defense
description:
Great defense game!
Classic Islands Defense game in awesome military style!

World War 2 is the deadliest war background of the game, offering you the best challenge of strategy game storyline ever!

- Multiplayer
- Various Heroes
- 6 unqiue units and gun
- 27 exciting levels
- A lot of angry enemies
- 13 types of enemies, from infantry to aviation

The best strategy is to place different heroes, defensive towers, as well as various soldiers is needed in order to win the battlefield. Caution: this is a very addicting game that is enjoyable in the palm of your hands!

Download now and get your excitement over this most exciting Tower Defence game ever only with World War II Defense. It is FREE!
